name: Core Crossing
description:
Travelers journey to the town of Melodiena to partake in the Trial of Revere. Those who successfully traverse through the labyrinth in the town's Core shall be granted the coveted Revere License to operate a guild. However, a sinister scheme is taking place in the mazes.

KEY FEATURES

  • Build Your Party

    Choose from 15 classes. Name your characters and select appearances and voices also.

  • Customize Skill Sets

    Level up through battles for skill points to unlock new abilities against foes.

  • Explore Various Mazes

    Be prepared to navigate treacherous and monster-filled environments with items and equipment.

  • Engage in Strategic Combat

    Exploit foes' weaknesses and use status effects to survive the labyrinth.

Also checkout: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1675480
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1841430/Xyz_Crossing
